title: Change Background of Profile page
body:
Hey guys, Can I change the Background of my profile page{{champion:41}} ? The classics skin isnt looking good{{item:3136}} 
Can I just change it to any skin that i own? Thanks!

replies.body: Your profile banner is determined by the default splash art of your most recently played champions. If you'd like to change the banner, you can play another champion for a while, but otherwise, there's nothing that can be done at the moment. Sorry!
